channel.title: iptables on Sparking Mind
channel.description: Recent content in iptables on Sparking Mind

item.title: iptables command(docker related)
item.description: flush all rules bash sudo iptables -P INPUT ACCEPT sudo iptables -P FORWARD ACCEPT sudo iptables -P OUTPUT ACCEPT sudo iptables -F sudo iptables -X sudo iptables -t nat -F sudo iptables -t nat -X
